title: Who should get reworked after Urgot and Eve
body:
Because that is something that should come to my mind as both {{champion:28}} & {{champion:6}} of their reworks are really close

It comes to my mind on who deserves the Full rework (Not a small mini rework like {{champion:33}} {{champion:266}} {{champion:102}} {{champion:203}} ) I mean a full fleshed out 100% Visual Gameplay Update like {{champion:3}} {{champion:44}} {{champion:19}} {{champion:78}} {{champion:41}}{{champion:83}}  {{champion:13}}_<(insert Ryze 5th rework joke here)_


In my Opinion 3 at the top of my head really needs one desperately needs one ASAP.{{champion:80}} {{champion:23}} {{champion:5}} 

Why? 
1. is because they are just so unhealthy right now its no joke how bad they are.
2. They are either Oppressive or Unfun to play as/against them that has little to no counterplay against them
3. My personal opinion on this one, I really hate them with a passion that I question why they are still in that current state right now.

And something that really is bothered me is that 2 of them got a skin that are completely not deserving of a skin *cough*chemtech {{champion:23}}  *cough* Dragonslayer {{champion:5}} .

Still its kinda of a personal gripe of mine at that point. 

If they give them a full update, Ill be sure to judge them fairly when it happens. 
As for now, I'm still going to complain on saying "Why haven't they already reworked '{{champion:80}} {{champion:5}}  {{champion:23}}'"
